title: Hyperbolic Semantic Networks: Julia/Rust Implementation
description: High-performance implementation of Ollivier-Ricci curvature analysis for semantic networks, enabling identification of hyperbolic geometry boundary conditions. This implementation provides 10-100x performance improvements over Python through Julia/Rust FFI integration.

High-performance implementation of Ollivier-Ricci curvature analysis for semantic networks, enabling identification of hyperbolic geometry boundary conditions. This implementation provides 10-100x performance improvements over Python through Julia/Rust FFI integration. Validated against Q1 SOTA literature (Ollivier 2009, Ni et al. 2015, 2019).
notes: Initial release of Julia/Rust implementation for Nature-tier research on hyperbolic geometry in semantic networks.
